Topic: Law
Context: At a concert, exactly eight compositions—F, H, L, O, P, R, S, and T—are to be performed exactly once each, consecutively and one composition at a time. The order of their performance must satisfy the following conditions: T is performed either immediately before F or immediately after R. At least two compositions are performed either after F and before R, or after R and before F. O is performed either first or fifth. The eighth composition performed is either L or H. P is performed at some time before S. At least one composition is performed either after O and before S, or after S and before O.
Question: Which one of the following lists the compositions in an order in which they could be performed during the concert, from first through eighth?
Choices:
  A: L, P, S, R, O, T, F, H
  B: O, T, P, F, S, H, R, L
  C: P, T, F, S, L, R, O, H
  D: P, T, F, S, O, R, L, H
  E: T, F, P, R, O, L, S, H
Reflection:
You previously answered this question incorrectly.
Then you reflected on the problem, your solution, and the correct answer.
Use your self-reflection (below) to help you answer this question.
Any information that you are not allowed to see will be marked [REDACTED].

Thought: 
The conditions are as follows:
1. T is performed either immediately before F or immediately after R.
2. At least two compositions are performed either after F and before R, or after R and before F.
3. O is performed either first or fifth.
4. The eighth composition performed is either L or H.
5. P is performed at some time before S.
6. At least one composition is performed either after O and before S, or after S and before O.
Let's go through the options:
A: L, P, S, R, O, T, F, H - This violates condition 1 (T is not immediately before F or immediately after R) and condition 5 (P is not performed before S).
B: O, T, P, F, S, H, R, L - This violates condition 1 (T is not immediately before F or immediately after R) and condition 4 (The eighth composition is not L or H).
C: P, T, F, S, L, R, O, H - This violates condition 3 (O is not performed first or fifth) and condition 6 (No composition is performed after O and before S, or after S and before O).
D: P, T, F, S, O, R, L, H - This satisfies all conditions.
E: T, F, P, R, O, L, S, H - This violates condition 2 (There are not at least two compositions performed either after F and before R, or after R and before F) and condition 5 (P is not performed before S).
Action: Answer("D")
